item.title: Is that really your boss calling? Jericho Security raises $15M to stop deepfake fraud that’s cost businesses $200M in 2025 alone
item.description: Pentagon-backed Jericho Security raises $15 million to combat deepfake fraud that has already cost North American businesses $200 million in 2025, usi...

item.title: Intel’s new CEO signals streamlining efforts but does not spell out exact layoff numbers
item.description: Lip-Bu Tan, the new CEO of Intel, sent out a blunt message to employees saying the company has to reorganize to be more efficient.

item.title: Zencoder buys Machinet to challenge GitHub Copilot as AI coding assistant consolidation accelerates
item.description: Zencoder acquires Machinet to strengthen its position in the rapidly consolidating AI coding assistant market, expanding its JetBrains ecosystem integ...

item.title: Ethically trained AI startup Pleias releases new small reasoning models optimized for RAG with built-in citations
item.description: Pleias emphasizes the models’ suitability for integration into search-augmented assistants, educational tools, and user support systems.

item.title: Evil Geniuses and Theta Labs launch AI chatbot based on esports mascot Meesh
item.description: Evil Geniuses, the well-known esports organization and brand, has launched its Meesh AI chatbot in a partnership with Theta Labs.
